## Summary
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve? Why is it needed?

## Proposed Solution
How would you implement this feature? Include:
- Which components would be affected (Vision/Memory/Controller/Training)
- What changes would be needed
- Any architectural implications

## Alternatives Considered
What other approaches have you thought about?

## Implementation Plan
If this is a large feature, how should it be broken down into smaller PRs?

- [ ] Step 1: ...
- [ ] Step 2: ...
- [ ] Step 3: ...

## Additional Context
Any other information, examples, or references.

## Acceptance Criteria
How will we know this feature is complete and working?

- [ ] Criterion 1
- [ ] Criterion 2
- [ ] Tests added
- [ ] Documentation updated
